stories.Title: Bing is getting smarter
stories.Description: At its latest event, Microsoft decided to upgrade the Bing experience with a touch of AI. DALL-E 3 is now integrated into the search engine for image generation, in addition to other features.
stories.Tweet: Bing is getting smarter 📦 At its latest event, Microsoft decided to upgrade the Bing experience with a touch of AI. DALL-E 3 is now integrated into the search engine for image generation, in addition to other features. #microsoft https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/22/microsoft-bing-to-gain-more-personalized-answers-support-for-dalle-e-3-and-watermarked-ai-images/

stories.Title: AI or nothing
stories.Description: The AI race is rewriting the rules of tech competition. Google and Microsoft are at the forefront, seeking new ways to integrate this technology into their product offerings.
stories.Tweet: AI or nothing 📦 The AI race is rewriting the rules of tech competition. Google and Microsoft are at the forefront, seeking new ways to integrate this technology into their product offerings. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/09/22/ai-microsoft-google-windows-copilot

stories.Title: How do we get you down from there?
stories.Description: All great things end, and after years of exploration, the ISS retires in 2030. But deorbiting a space station safely is not a simple task, and NASA is looking at how to do it properly.
stories.Tweet: How do we get you down from there? 📦 All great things end, and after years of exploration, the ISS retires in 2030. But deorbiting a space station safely is not a simple task, and NASA is looking at how to do it properly. #NASA https://gizmodo.com/nasa-iss-commercial-partners-deorbit-iss-tug-orbit-1850860764

stories.Title: Failure is part of the journey
stories.Description: Galactic Energy has encountered its first setback in a series of successful launches. The company announced the loss of a Ceres-1 rocket and its payload and is investigating the failure.
stories.Tweet: Failure is part of the journey 📦 Galactic Energy has encountered its first setback in a series of successful launches. The company announced the loss of a Ceres-1 rocket and its payload and is investigating the failure. #china https://spacenews.com/chinas-galactic-energy-suffers-first-launch-failure/

stories.Title: Unveiling Europa's mysteries
stories.Description: Jupiter's moon may hold the key to life beyond Earth. Recent insights from the James Webb Telescope detected carbon dioxide on its surface, potentially linked to its hidden ocean.
stories.Tweet: Unveiling Europa's mysteries 📦 Jupiter's moon may hold the key to life beyond Earth. Recent insights from the James Webb Telescope detected carbon dioxide on its surface, potentially linked to its hidden ocean. #space https://www.engadget.com/nasas-james-webb-telescope-may-have-found-the-source-of-europas-carbon-104717890.html

stories.Title: From an asteroid to Earth
stories.Description: Samples from Bennu are ready to touch down on Earth following the conclusion of NASA's OSIRIS-REx mission. Watch the live stream on Sunday.
stories.Tweet: From an asteroid to Earth 📦 Samples from Bennu are ready to touch down on Earth following the conclusion of NASA's OSIRIS-REx mission. Watch the live stream on Sunday. #space https://www.space.com/nasa-osiris-rex-asteroid-sample-return-landing-what-time

stories.Title: On its electric path
stories.Description: As we've stated before, Toyota is not playing around. Defeating claims of lagging behind, the automaker has firmly set its goal to produce 600,000 EVs by 2025.
stories.Tweet: On its electric path 📦 As we've stated before, Toyota is not playing around. Defeating claims of lagging behind, the automaker has firmly set its goal to produce 600,000 EVs by 2025. #toyota https://electrek.co/2023/09/22/toyota-finally-picking-up-ev-production-pace/

stories.Title: Jaguar says yes to NACS
stories.Description: Another major EV industry player has joined the NACS club. Jaguar has recently announced its partnership with Tesla to adopt the plug and access the Supercharger network.
stories.Tweet: Jaguar says yes to NACS 📦 Another major EV industry player has joined the NACS club. Jaguar has recently announced its partnership with Tesla to adopt the plug and access the Supercharger network. #jaguar https://electrek.co/2023/09/21/jaguar-signs-deal-tesla-supercharger-access-adopt-nacs/

stories.Title: No password is needed
stories.Description: Upgrade your GitHub security with Passkeys! Finally out of beta, this passwordless experience is now available to all users.
stories.Tweet: No password is needed 📦 Upgrade your GitHub security with Passkeys! Finally out of beta, this passwordless experience is now available to all users. #GitHub https://github.blog/2023-09-21-passkeys-are-generally-available/

title: Bing's latest upgrades, NASA's deorbiting plans, Bennu is coming to Earth
description: It's time to decide which search engine might become your go-to from now on, and Microsoft is making sure you choose Bing. The ISS's journey is reaching its end in 2030, and NASA has to find a safe way to bring it back. If you know how to get it down from there, give them a call. Also, stay tuned this Sunday for the landing of the OSIRIS-REx mission, which will bring back a piece of asteroid Bennu as a souvenir!
